details.description: Practise the official driving theory test from the Driving Standards Agency (DSA).
details.more_information:
Practice tests are free of charge.

You'll take a different practice test depending on whether you're learning to drive a:

+ car
+ motorcycle
+ lorry (large goods vehicle)
+ bus or coach (passenger carrying vehicle)

Each practice test has 50 questions.

The tests are similar to the real theory test you'll take at the test centre, but the real lorry, bus and coach tests have 100 questions.
details.introduction:
Practise the official driving theory test from the Driving Standards Agency (DSA).

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
details.will_continue_on: the Safe Driving for Life website
